resources: Pace Eats More Nutrition Home Weight Log In Sign Up Enter password Enter email Male Female Lose Maintain Gain Set Goals Age Feet Inches lbs Gender Weight Goal Height Submit Calorie Goal: About PaceEats Developers • Kevin Lutz • Tyheir Brooks • Paul Spadaccini • Aleya Corretjer PaceEats was created for a CS389: Software Engineering Fall 2021 semester course at Pace University by four senior Computer Science majors.\n\nIt\'s purpose is to allow Pace students to track their caloric intake as well as the environmental impact of the foods that they are eating. Food Recommendations First start with white rice from the Chinese Station. Order a turkey burger with peppers and onions from the Grill Station. Ask them to chop the burger. Then add the chopped burger with your toppings to the white rice. Add sauce if you would like. Wrap For a nice yummy wrap from the Sandwich Station order a whole wheat, spinach or tomato wrap. Add grilled chicken, mozzarella cheese, roasted red peppers, and a little of balsamic dressing. Omlete Omelette Start your morning off with a healthy breakfast. From the Gill Station order an egg white omelette with toppings like spinach, peppers, onions, cheese, tomatoes, etc. You could pair this with a yogurt or smoothie from the Smoothie Station.
